npc_lines.line: Hmm. Another stranger it seems. Let me guess, you're looking for something.
Bold move stranger. Fine. Have it your way. I didn't like it too much anyway.
I guess we have no choice but to work together stranger. Here's the key. Don't do anything stupid now.
Cursed? Is that why I haven't been able to get out? Darn, have at it stranger.

choices.line: Give me that key! I know you have it!
I am indeed. I seem to be locked here. If you can help me find the key, I can get the both of us out.
I've been told the way out is cursed. Whomever holds the key is doomed to stay here for all eternity. I can help you get out. You just have to give it to me.
Thank you. Now, let's get you out of here.
